title: Personal Selection of Destiny Weapons
description: My personally-desired list of Destiny weapons and "god" rolls.  Own picks, cherry picks of streamers and 48klocs.


// False Promises
//notes: Great advice from CoolGuy (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ed_CuwSFLEo). Has GREAT range. 10m more than other auto rifles.  Has low base stability.  So some more stability is useful, even on M+KB
// Killing Wind, Unrelenting

// Hollow Words
//notes: Great advice from CoolGuy (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jz-xxEn0kTs).  The cap for 0 damage fall off is 17m (i.e. +5 range on Hollow Words.  Has lowest stability and handling stats for the archetype, so try not to penalise those too much.
// Killing Wind, Unrelenting
